name: B.Loop
description:
This lovingly crafted but brutally cruel game has been blended to perfection in the depths of the Butcherlab and now it's all yours. Butcher loop (B.Loop for short) is a frustratingly addictive test of your skills, you will be pitted against a malevolent A.I. hell bent on tormenting you in the endless Butcher loop.

With over 20 unique characters to unlock you'll have to survive as long as you can to rack up as many Loop Coins as possible!

Originally released for iOS & Android in 2016.

Credits

Pete Harries - Code & Design // Ollie Eliott - Art & Design // Albert Seymour - Music
